content:
Based on your preferences, here are some modern coffee shops with outdoor seating in the downtown area that are within a 10-15 minute walk from your office:

**Independent Shops:**

1. **Blue Bottle Coffee**: Known for their high-quality, small-batch coffee, Blue Bottle has a modern and sleek atmosphere with a large outdoor seating area. (12-minute walk)
2. **La Colombe Coffee Roasters**: This popular independent coffee shop has a bright and airy space with a large outdoor patio. They source their coffee beans from around the world and offer a variety of pour-overs and espresso drinks. (11-minute walk)
3. **Verve Coffee Roasters**: Verve is a California-based coffee company with a modern and industrial-chic vibe. They have a spacious outdoor seating area and offer a variety of specialty drinks. (13-minute walk)

**Chain Shops:**

1. **Starbucks Reserve Bar**: While Starbucks is a chain, their Reserve Bar locations offer a more upscale experience with a modern atmosphere and outdoor seating. They also feature rare and exotic coffee blends. (10-minute walk)
2. **The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf**: This chain coffee shop has a modern and comfortable atmosphere with outdoor seating. They offer a wide variety of coffee and tea drinks, including seasonal flavors. (12-minute walk)

Please note that walk times may vary depending on your office location and pace. I hope this helps, and I'm sure you'll find a great spot to enjoy your Friday 2 pm break!
